data.text: Halli Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang Pathian diang inchat lekleiya nichaknasik khat-um malung juosiin maknasik-ah minkhina chong aleiminchu.
Jisu'n aleiti, “Khuopui inkhat-ah Pathian kachimak khat-um mi ngai khoya kathomak chongkatan miring inkhat aleiom;
Halli khawa khopui khan chuulmei inkhat-um aleiom, numeisanu khan chong katanpa diang aheiwazoolla ajuoti, ‘Kei inhalpui mi ngaikha phaphu naluokpiro aleiti.
Takkha ama'n apha kasoottak leirangai pimak, halli ahekna ah ama'n atheinuoa inti, keihi Pathian kachimak emakli mi ngai kakayamak ka e-innum,
chuulmeinu khan keidiang heiwazoolla kanakacher sikneek achu, kei'n amadiang thopidan kasuok kha thopitakte. Halli kei'n kathopimak inchu ama'n heiwa zoolta keihi anaminpoongsik eii!’ ”
Halli Pumi in aleiti, “Rangairu kathamak chongkatanpa'n i-tihi.
Khat-um Pathian diang suun li zaan boiya Pathian diang niya kaom Pathian ikadang mi ngaikha Pathian in inmanisik-ah phaphu luokpimak niabe? Halli ama'n inmani kasansik hi insuumniabe?
Kei'n nangnidiang kanati, Pathian in inmani sikbit-ah innottheiya phu aluoksik eii. Miring sapa ajuonikhan nuoipilchung hin, kangamna lamunibo?”
Atu ka-ang mi'n atheinuoa mikadik ka eii inti, halli mi ngaichu iteii emu tia kangaidon minkhi nahi Jisu'n aleiril.
“Miring inni'n biak-inna Pathian kani inleisi, inkhat khachu Pharisee eii, halli inkhat khachu rampar kakhoompa eii.

Pharisee pa'n atheinuo ah a-ngirra aleini,18:11 atheinuo ah angirra Pathian aleini; aleiilaak larik achu, intheiya halli ama diang alei inni. ‘Pathian, kei'n nang kanaminpaak, tichu mi ngai angnga keihi kakheel innuomma mi ngai kakasuut, malung inthiangmak, emakli zool-inthai emong, hiwa rampar kakhoompa ka-ang um emong.
Kei'n haptakhat-ah sak woini kangei, halli kei'n kimasuok rakip tum soomma tumkhat nangdiang kanapeii.’
Takkha rampar kakhoompa khan kalaak-ah a-ngirra aroop kabeenna khat-um chuntiang-um hong-en matormak-ah, ‘Pathian, manu karoon keihi naminriangro tia aleini!’

Kei'n kanati,” “Hiwa rampar khakhoompa'n Pathian mit enna aleiilaak mipa khaneek ah mikadik eya inntiang aleisi. Ajarchu apumtaak insaang mikha aminniamsik eii, halli apumtaak inniam mikha aminsaangsik eii.”Matt 23:12; Luk 14:11
Halli mi lekkhat in naipang ngaikha ama koolla rawaan penasik-ah inheiruoi, takkha asiamruoi ngai'n inmu phakhan ranna inleinei.
Takkha Jisu'n naipang ngaikha ama koolla aleikoiya ati, “Naipang ngaihi kakoolla heiwarasu, inmani kha khaapmaru, Pathian Rengramhi inmani ka-ang ngaisik eii.
Kei'n inthiangnga kanati, hiwa kadoong naipang ngai angnga Pathian Rengramkha ningkeiluutmak inchu angtik niteii Pathian Rengram luuttheinutun.”
Jihudi lamkakei inkhat in aheirakel, “Katha karu, hektik kaboi ringkhuo mutheinasik angme kei'n kathosik?”
Jisu'n amadiang ati, “Angjarra katha ninatime?” “Tuteii katha ommu Pathian eleiya.
Pathian chongpekha najetbo: ‘Zool-inthai thomaro, mi thatmaro, inruup thomaro, mi ngaikha rilsemaro, nanu napa kayaro,’ ” Suok 20:13,14; Innidan 5:18,19
Ama'n aheimasang, “Hiwa chongpeii rakip ngaichu naipang ka-elai inphut kahongjuijeii.”

Jisu'n hiwangai ajet phakhan ama diang aleitipi, “Nang in nathosik chuonkhat laom, naneinaak rakip juor inlang sara ngaidiang sempiro, nang in marwaan ramma na-inchongsik eii, halli heikirnook inlang kanuk najuiro.”
Takkha ama'n hiwa ajet phakhan amalung leihoimak, ajarchu ama inchongthei mi eii.
Jisu'n amadiang ahei enna ati, “Inchong mi ngai'n Pathian Rengram luutsik hi angtuk intakme.
Ajarchu inchong mi'n Pathian Rengram kaluutsik neek achu Salaileem in simphoi kuorra kaluutsik abeiwiai.”
Khawa kajet mi ngai'n amadiang inti, “Hale atume ringna kamusik?”
Takkha ama'n ati, “Miring ngaisik-ah ka-ethei makkha, Pathian diangchu ethei eii.”
Khale inruoiya Peter in aheiti, “Enro, keini'n kin inn kinmathaanna nang nanuk kinnajuijei.”
“Oh,” Jisu'n inmani diang aheiti, “Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kinnati, atu ka-ang in a-inn, anumei, a-u ngai emakli anu apa halli asa ngai Pathian Rengram sik-ah ning mathaan inchu
atuunna ringkhohin kataamma amusik khat-um kahongsik pha-ah hektik kaboi ringna inmusik eii.”

Khawa suoli Jisu'n asiamruoi soomleini ngaikha akoisuok ah inmani diang aleiti, “Enru! eini'n Jerusalem tiang nisisik eii, halli Pathian chong kachoi ngai'n Miring sapa chungnga inleimajia rakipkha kajuotungsik ejei.
Tichu ama kha zaatlop ngaidiang inpesik eii, halli ama kha innui puisik eii, injak inpesik eii, halli inmachinthuonsik eii.
Inmani'n ama kha inwuok ah inthatsik, halli ama kha nithum huuini ahongring nooksik eii.”
Takkha asiamruoi ngai'n chong ngaihi iteii leijetmu, khat-um hiwa irilsuok chong ngaihi inmani sikbeiya inthuuk ejarra, angtiname tikha inmani'n leijetmu.
Halli Jisu'n Jericho aheinei phakhan, Bukani mitkacho inkhat lamsirra in-ongnga leiom.
Halli ama'n mipui sirasa ajet phakhan, ama'n “angjarrame tia alei rakel?”
Inmani'n amadiang inleiti, “Nazareth Jisu kha eii kasihi,”
halli ama'n ahongkheek, “Jisu! David sapa, kei naminriangro!”
Halli amatiang kaom mi ngai'n omchianro tia ranna inleinei, takkha kheella ahongkhek nook, “David sapa! kei naminriangro!”
Halli Jisu'n a-ngirra, mitkacho pakha amadiang heiruoinasik-ah chong aleipeii, halli ama'n ahong naiphakhan, amadiang aleirakel,
“Angme nang in keidiang ninna minthozoot?”
Halli Jisu amadiang aleiti, “Namit kha kamu etaro! nang inngamna khan inamidam ejei.”
Khawapha takkhan amitkha aleimuwa Pathian minpaak ah Jisu nuk aleijui, mi rakip in khawa inmupha khan Pathian kha inmani'n inleiminpaak.
